name: CleanRobot
0:
”Alexa, ask Clean Robot to start cleaning”
”Alexa, ask Clean Robot to stop cleaning”
”Alexa, ask Clean Robot to start charging”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clean robot
des:
Using Amazon Alexa, the Clean Robot skill allows you to interact, monitor and control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner by using voice commands.

To get started, you will need to link your Clean Robot skill with your app account

Once linked, you can use voice commands to control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner. For instance, you can try the below voice commands:

* Alexa, ask Clean Robot to start cleaning.
* Alexa, ask Clean Robot to stop cleaning.
* Alexa, ask Clean Robot to start charging.
